entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: SignOut overloads that take only one authentication scheme #49391
  • Remove the ASP.NET Core Angular & React templates from the .NET SDK for .NET 8 #49388
    8.0-preview7
  • Component rendering/positioning problem in the new blazor web application template #49387
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS0246 error for endpoint with generic type parameter #49384
  • Investigate using the new T4 Command-Line Tool for .NET #49382
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS8601 warning for required non-nullable record parameters #49381
  • Rate limiting middleware OnReject assign bug #49379

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_ef, single_query #49370
  • Perf regression: updates, updates #49371
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #49380
  • Running fine on RHEL 8 about half an hour then got "The LDAP server is unavailable." exception. #49105
  • I want to update User Claims on Change UserName Event and( Renew Access Token + Updated Claim) #49361
  • Blazor Server throws Microsoft.JSInterop.JSDisconnectedException once the page is being refreshed #49376
  • @microsoft/signalr (JavaScript) accessTokenFactory not providing access_token query param #48926
  • An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection in Blazor SSR 8.0.100-preview.5 #49203
  • Http2WebSocketTests.HEADERS_Received_SecondRequest_ConnectProtocolReset is flaky #48737
  • Allow empty WebApplicationBuilder to be created without default behavior #48811
    8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Finalize the integration between runtime and Blazor #49385
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview7
  • Unquarantine healthy tests. #49378
    area-runtime
  • Tweak AddRazorPages trimming warning. #49377
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [hotreload] Change file encode #49247
    area-mvc
  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2221247 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
